mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM TBL_WEEK_WORKLOG WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode }

SELECT W.WEEK_WORKLOG_CODE, M.MEMBER_CODE, W.WEEK_REPORTING_DATE, W.MON_CONTENT, W.TUES_CONTENT, W.WED_CONTENT, W.THUR_CONTENT, W.FRI_CONTENT, W.WEEK_NOTE, W.WEEK_SPECIAL_NOTE FROM TBL_WEEK_WORKLOG W JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON W.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE WHERE W.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } LIMIT #{ selectCriteria.startRow }, #{ selectCriteria.limit }

SELECT W.WEEK_WORKLOG_CODE, M.MEMBER_CODE, W.WEEK_REPORTING_DATE, W.MON_CONTENT, W.TUES_CONTENT, W.WED_CONTENT, W.THUR_CONTENT, W.FRI_CONTENT, W.WEEK_NOTE, W.WEEK_SPECIAL_NOTE FROM TBL_WEEK_WORKLOG W JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON W.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE WHERE W.WEEK_WORKLOG_CODE = #{ weekWorklogCode } ORDER BY W.WEEK_WORKLOG_CODE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_WEEK_WORKLOG ( MEMBER_CODE, MON_CONTENT, TUES_CONTENT, WED_CONTENT, THUR_CONTENT, FRI_CONTENT, WEEK_NOTE, WEEK_SPECIAL_NOTE ) VALUES ( #{ memberCode }, #{ monContent }, #{ tuesContent }, #{ wedContent }, #{ thurContent }, #{ friContent }, #{ weekNote }, #{ weekSpecialNote } )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_WEEK_WORKLOG SET MON_CONTENT = #{ monContent }, TUES_CONTENT = #{ tuesContent }, WED_CONTENT = #{ wedContent }, THUR_CONTENT = #{ thurContent }, FRI_CONTENT = #{ friContent }, WEEK_NOTE = #{ weekNote }, WEEK_SPECIAL_NOTE = #{ weekSpecialNote } WHERE WEEK_WORKLOG_CODE = #{ weekWorklogCode }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_WEEK_WORKLOG WHERE WEEK_WORKLOG_CODE = #{ weekWorklogCode }
